definition: to offer a cigarette (to a guest)
cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke

sentences.english: A smoke a smoke to the guests, there is also the habit of Korea since ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 敬烟向客人敬烟也是韩国人自古以来就有的习惯。

sentences.english: A smoke a smoke to the guests, there is also the habit of Korea since ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 敬烟向客人敬烟也是韩国人自古以来就有的习惯。

definition: to bow with hands held in front
to pay a New Year call/to wish sb a Happy New Year
nobody will find fault with extra courtesy (idiom)/courtesy costs nothing
to bow respectfully with clasped hands/to beg humbly
to welcome sb with a smiling face (idiom)
to accept a gift/to acknowledge greetings
tip given on a happy occasion (traditional)
to nod one's head and bow (idiom); bowing and scraping/unctuous fawning
